attributes.action: Halt the damaging activities of IP harvesting IT companies and their beneficiaries in Intellectual Property disputes over Peer to Peer (P2P) File Sharing Networks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition aims to halt the activities of known IP harvesting IT companies who use unregulated and potentially flawed or illegal methods of data collection in order to pass this information on for a profit to solicitors who use the unregulated information for financial gain. This petition also aims to halt the activities of those solicitors in these cases, where such unreliable data can be used to destroy the lives of innocent individuals through misplaced allegations of criminal and civil wrongdoing.
